snippet: LeBron James scored 27 points and Kyrie Irving added 22 as Cleveland won in overtime in Dallas.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Cleveland Cavaliers beat Dallas Mavericks, 110-107; other pro basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 27 points and Kyrie Irving added 22 as Cleveland won in overtime in Dallas.

headline.print_headline: Cavs’ Streak Reaches Eight as They Edge the Mavericks
headline.main: Cavs’ Streak Reaches Eight as They Edge the Mavericks
